title: 3dToutcount
description: Calculates the number of 'outliers' in a 3D+time dataset at each time point.

output_afni_head.title: Output AFNI HEAD file
output_afni_head.description: Output dataset in AFNI format (HEAD file).

output_afni_brik.title: Output AFNI BRIK file
output_afni_brik.description: Output dataset in AFNI format (BRIK file).
